review_blob: Good session beer.  One of my go to beers when I?m out.  Not my fav but very drinkable.  Not too bitter with a slight citruis after tast.  Good balance with slight lacing on the glass.
Good nose with a hint a watermelon.  Cloudy as a wheat should be.  7% abv.  Not too sweat.  Use local melons.  Clean with a.clear after taste.  Better than I thought it would be.
